body.name: Small Ironing Machine, Safe Portable Remove Creases Wet Dry Use US Plug 110V Mini Iron for Travel for Clothes
body.stockDetail: Only 3 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 11 hrs 49 mins
features: [Easy To Use] Mini handheld iron turns on and uses a spray bottle to humidify clothes. When the clothes are wet, press the button to start ironing. Completely ironed, leaving no edges.
[Triangular Tip] This mini ironing machine is designed with a triangular tip so that you can easily finish ironing. Ideal for narrow areas such as buttons, turn down collars, necklaces.
[Flexible Use] Mini iron can be used for dry and wet double ironing, flat ironing and hanging ironing. Compact size, easy to carry and use at home or on trips, fits in luggage and backpacks.
[Removes Creases] The small handheld iron can effectively remove creases and folds from your clothes with steam. Easy to operate and safe to use. Help make your life more sophisticated.
[Widely Applicable] Portable steam iron for high temperature dry and wet ironing of any fabrics such as cotton, polyester and silk. Can be used for clothes, shirts, curtains, bed sheets, etc.
